import React from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' export default function ProductScreen({match}) { const product = products.find((p, index) => { return p._id === match.params.id }) return (
Go Back

  • {product.name}

  • Price: ${product.price}

  • Description: {product.description}

  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Status: {product.countInStock > 0? "In Stock": "Out of Stock"}
) }
